prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Organ, Bass, Drums, Piano, but without Guitar.
captions:
Style 1:
This piece of music features Piano, Organ, Bass, and Drums, but no Guitar.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Organ, Bass, Drums, and Piano, but no Guitar.

Style 3:
This composition is made up of Piano, Organ, Bass, and Drums, with no Guitar.
